name: SPLAT! (itch) (Tricky Digital Media)
description: SPLAT! is a fast-paced, kill-em-all, top-down action game for Android. Kill the bugs before they leave the screen or you will lose! Defeat 3 rounds and advance to the next level, but beware, the bugs become increasingly difficult. Collect the coins and go to the store to purchase power-ups to give you the winning edge! SPLAT! is for all ages, and fun for everyone! SPLAT! is ©2020 by Tricky Productions & Tricky Digital Media. All rights reserved.
